name: 2nd Edition of World Nanotechnology Conference
content: World Nano 2020, planned to achieve the knowledge transfer of highly updated and relevant information to a broad audience in Nanotechnology and Nanoscience. It can be achieved by scheduled scientific sessions, keynote presentations by renowned scientists, and poster sessions at this conference, which promises to deliver something for everyone involved in Nanotechnology research or practice. World Nano 2020 will provide you on the newest developments and preserves you up to date on the newest advances in Nanotechnology. A distinctive phase of the event is to highlight research and clinical practice that include Nano biotechnology, Nanomaterialâ€™s, Nano medicines and many more contributions with deeper analysis of interventional procedures for those in the field of Nanoscience.
